Class GitMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • GitMap

  • public class GitMap
extends java.lang.Object
    Main method used by pm_extrator_util.jar. Unzips an exported platform module and maps it into a working directory. Accomplishes the following steps 1) Validates passed in parameters to ensure the files exists and are accessible 2) Unzips the exported platform module 3) Strips the platform module of $ 4) Backs up the current local directory 5) Overwrites the current directory with the exported platform module by mapping the exported platform module into the local directory
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Reynolds

      • GitMap

        public GitMap(java.lang.String exp,
              java.lang.String git,
              java.lang.String customer,
              java.lang.String pm)
        Maps the exported platform module folder to the platform module folder currently residing in the path depicted by the params.
        Parameters:
        src - Source that depicts backend of map -> will be 'PlatModX'
        git - Folder that holds local Git directory
        customer - Customer folder in which this platform module resides
        pm - Platform Module name

                                       java.lang.String localDir)
        Test to ensure local directory and exported zip folder exist
        Parameters:
        export - Exported folder name
        localDir - Local git directory
        Returns:

      • clearCustomLinksXML

        private static void clearCustomLinksXML(java.lang.String gitPath)
        Custom Link xml files are going to be replaced with the new custom link files from the exported module. This method rids the CustomLinkD1 folder of outdate custom links files.
        Parameters:
        gitPath - path of platform module in local dir

      • mapFolders

        private void mapFolders(java.lang.String export,
                        java.lang.String destination)
        Map folder export to folder destination
        Parameters:
        export - Folder where unzipped exported platform module is
        destination - Folder where platform module is in local git directory

      • mapCoDesign

        private void mapCoDesign(java.lang.String path)
        In the exported unzipped platform module, move around the custom object design scripts so they can be smoothly mapped 1=1 into git directory. This method moves there location and removes $ from their names
        Parameters:
        path - Path of Unzipped Exported platform module
